resources.string: Вы действительно хотите удалить это сообщение?
Вы действительно хотите пометить это сообщение как ответ?

Welcome to Forum Chat!
 Here you can quickly get an answer to any of your questions, if, of course, there is an answer to it, and our users know it.
 First, I recommend that you put your own avatar and assign a nickname at Settings, so that people know who is responsible, and what would be beautiful.
 To ask a question, go to the Forums tab and click Add question.
 If you want to view the questions and find the ones that have already been answered, or answer the question yourself, you can still use the Search in the same tab.
 If you want to add a question to the tracked ones, you just need to click on the Star directly in the question itself to know when it will be answered.
 In order to view the questions that you Created or those that you marked as Tracked, go to the Library tab. there are not only the above criteria, but also the History of viewed questions, in case you forgot where you viewed them.
 Enjoy your use!
